plugins.name: aiTerminal
plugins.description: AI Terminal plugin for Revolution EDA. Integrates AI agents (Claude, Gemini) for design assistance and automation.

plugins.name: revedasim
plugins.description: Simulation plugin for Revolution EDA using Xyce simulator. Provides netlisting and simulation capabilities for schematic designs.

plugins.name: revedaPlot
plugins.description: Plotting plugin for Revolution EDA. Enables visualization of simulation results using PyQtGraph.
